definition: surname Ji/abbr. for Jilin Province 吉林省[Ji2 lin2 Sheng3]
"cover" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 14), occurring in 軍|军[jun1], 冠[guan1] etc, known as 禿寶蓋|秃宝盖[tu1 bao3 gai4] or 平寶蓋|平宝盖[ping2 bao3 gai4]
to officially launch (a policy, program etc)/to appear on stage/to appear publicly/(of a bar girl) to leave with a client
Taibei or Taipei, capital of Taiwan
variant of 櫃檯|柜台[gui4 tai2]
steps/flight of steps/step (over obstacle)/fig. way out of an embarrassing situation/bench (geology)
to go off the stage/to fall from position of prestige/to step down (from office etc)/to disentangle oneself/to get off the hook

sentences.english: Connect this part to the machine.
sentences.chinese: 把這個零件安到這臺機器上。
倫敦的臺爾森銀行麼，先生？

sentences.english: The anti-virus software of this computer was pre-installed.
sentences.chinese: 這臺計算機的殺毒軟件是預裝的。

sentences.english: The plant has Rapier 80, Availability on 30 meters.
sentences.chinese: 本廠擁有劍桿織機80臺，月供貨30萬米。

sentences.english: Check if this machine has a public IP address.
sentences.chinese: 檢測這臺機器是否有一個公網IP地址。

sentences.english: Are you through with this word-processor?
sentences.chinese: 這臺文字處理機你用完了嗎？

sentences.english: Station WRC is off the air now. They signed off two hours ago.
sentences.chinese: WRC臺現在沒節目了，它在兩個小時前結束了廣播。

sentences.english: Gina bought the piano at a low price.
sentences.chinese: 吉娜以低價買了這臺鋼琴。

sentences.english: And behind it is the rainy-weather stage.
sentences.chinese: 而雨臺呢則在它的背面。

sentences.english: The computer cost so much that she didn't buy it.
sentences.chinese: 這臺計算機太貴一直她買不起。

sentences.english: An actor circling the stage suggests a long journey.
sentences.chinese: 而演員繞臺奔走則代表長途跋涉。

sentences.english: Dishing the Dirt is a documentary series broadcast on ITV1.
sentences.chinese: 骯髒的食物是ITV1臺的系列紀錄片。

sentences.english: The machine stops and starts at a touch.
sentences.chinese: 這臺機器一觸按鈕就可以啓動或停下。

sentences.english: The behavior of good soil field holding capacity on the tableland area is the superior advantage of ecological conditions for this region.
sentences.chinese: 臺原土壤優良持水特性是黃土旱源優勢的生態條件。

sentences.english: This machine was made by Uncle Wang .
sentences.chinese: 這臺機器是王叔叔造的。

sentences.english: The lug boss is completely arranged in an annular groove at the right end of the piston head.
sentences.chinese: 所述凸臺全部置於所述活塞頭右端的環狀槽內。

definition: Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)
for a particular person, occasion, purpose/focused on one thing/special/expert/particular (to sth)/concentrated/specialized

mark/sign/label/to mark with a symbol, label, lettering etc/to bear (a brand name, registration number etc)/prize/award/bid/target/quota/(old) the topmost branches of a tree/visible symptom/classifier for military units
to set up/to arrange/to establish/to found/to display
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
to lift/to hold up/to cite/to enumerate/to act/to raise/to choose/to elect/act/move/deed
two/both/some/a few/tael, unit of weight equal to 50 grams (modern) or 1⁄16 of a catty 斤[jin1] (old)
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
